name: LysanderTalk
_source: s;Lysander;Worried I might make a break for it?
s;Simon;Not really, I just wanted to check how you're feeling.
s;Lysander;I don't shy away from fights, Lord Verstadt.|Just ain't in my nature.
s;Lysander;Here's the cowardly way to do it-|Start talking, then have me put one between his eyes.
s;Simon;I don't think that's called for yet.|This might not need to come to bloodshed.
s;Lysander;Possible.{w} But I do like a fair fight more.|Either way, just give me the signal.
